item.title: Sean Gunn Confirms His Superman Movie Role, What James Gunn Told Him He Could Say And Addresses Playing The Same DC Character As Pedro Pascal
item.description: James Gunn's brother, Sean Gunn, confirms his new DCU role in the upcoming Superman movie and addresses playing the same DC character as Pedro Pascal.
